alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 9:43AM CDT until June 01 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. .Additional rainfall over locations already in flood stage will stagnate river level drops over the next few days. Locations not in flood stage will bump closer as rainfall accumulates. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until early next Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 AM CDT Wednesday, the stage was 22.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 AM CDT Wednesday was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday evening and continue falling to 20.9 feet next Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.8 feet on 08/13/2016. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
